articles.title: Sun is going through a mid-life crisis. Here's how long it has before dying - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The European Space Agency found that the life-giving star is around 4.57 billion years old which amounts to it being in its middle age.
articles.content:
The Sun, which scientists predict to be about 4.57 billion years old, is currently going through a midlife crisis, a study has found.
